title: Litro to import gas from Thailand at 10$ gain
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Litro gs company says that it has taken steps to purchase gas from Thailand.
The company stated that it would buy 300,000 metric tons of gas a year from Thailand under a new agreement, with a metric ton of gas purchased from Thailand at $ 95.
The company also points out that a metric ton of gas previously purchased from Oman cost it $ 105.
Accordingly, with the purchase of gas from Thailand, an advantage of $ 10 per metric ton can be gained, Litro Gas stated.
The company added that the first consignment of gas ordered from Thailand will be delivered to the island next month.
